be.ac.ulg.montefiore.run.jadti
Class DecisionTreeBuilder

java.lang.Object
  be.ac.ulg.montefiore.run.jadti.SimpleDecisionTreeBuilder
      be.ac.ulg.montefiore.run.jadti.DecisionTreeBuilder

public class DecisionTreeBuilder
extends SimpleDecisionTreeBuilder

A builder of decision trees from a database.

The decision tree aims to guess a (so called) 'goal' attribute thanks to 'test attributes' values.

Certain values may be unknown. The algorithms involving unknown values are those of C4.5 (Ross Quinlan).
